title: Unions: putting you in the picture
brief_description: Designed to inform the migrant worker of the basic working of trade unions, and how they can become more involved in union activities. Shows the historical development of trade-unions in Australia and explains the functions of the members, delegates, organisers, branches and the ACTU. Contains some scenes in b&w.
